metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8485 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The setup_group function in bfd/elf.c in libbfd in GNU binutils 2.24 andearlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) andpossibly execute arbitrary code via crafted section group headers in an ELFfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8485` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu3.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu3.1').
